alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 21 at 7:22PM CST until January 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15 feet, Lowlands and agricultural land near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 13.7 feet and nearly steady. - Forecast...The river is expected to begin rising on Saturday, reaching a crest of 15 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 15 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Black River West 15.0 13.7 Fri 6 pm CST 13.8 15.0 13.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 730 AM CST.
